FAQ

Discover Our Featured Listings

These featured listings contain exclusive real estate opportunities within the city

Company's Questions

What is Estate Marketing?

Estate Marketing is a New Zealand's House and Property company whose main business is into real estate investment

What is the specific activity of the company?

We are into buying of properties in potentially rapid developing areas which with time appreciates and returns profit to the company and it investors.

Is Estate Marketing Services available for the public?

Estate Marketing is available to the public and beneficiary to everyone in any part of the world above the age of 18.

How do I check the authenticity of the company?

Estate Marketing was officially incorporated on 03 June 2016 under the New Zealand Company's Registry. You can check the company's registration number: 112223333. and can also view the certificate here.

What are the risk of loss of funds?

Estate Marketing is a platform that is risk-free. However, to avoid unforeseen loss, the company continuously fills its contingency fund. In the case of any maintenance situations, our investors can expect to receive their money back with profit included.

Account Questions

How can I register with Estate Marketing Services?

'Registration' procedure requires your personal data, email and password. Pay attention to correctness and accuracy of data you enter, including your email.

Are there any limitation during account registration?

Only people 18 years old and more can become clients. To become an Investor of Real Estate Financial Services you need to register an account. Registering is completely free and will take only a few minutes. After this, you can officially become a member and will be able to execute your investment strategies. Please note that by agreeing to the Terms and Conditions during the registration you automatically confirm that you are of legal age in your country of residence and that by using our platform you don`t violate any laws of your country of residence.

What shall I do if I forgot account password?

Click on 'Forgot Password' link, enter your e-mail and follow instruction. You'll receive your account reset information by email.

Can I have more than one account?

No, each member can have only one account in realestatefinancecountry.com. Any attempt of fraud will result in permanent blocking of the account & the funds deposited in the account will be frozen.

Are there any security means in the protection of my account?

In your personal there are additional 'Security Settings'. We also integrate ultimate security with 2FA.

Deposit Questions

What payment option do you accept?

You can invest using popular payment options - Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), USDT (TRC20) and USDT (ERC20). We will expand the list with the development of the project.

What are the packages of the company's investment?

We offer three investment packages to our investors which are Basic, Premium and Property, giving them range of affordable opportunities for them to choose at their convenience.

What is the range of investment in this packages?

Basic plan offers: Min: $100 and Max: $4999Premium plan offers: Min: $5000 & Max: $14999Property plan offers: Min: $20000 & Max: unlimited

What are the accruals and duration of these packages?

Basic plan offers 1.5% daily for 8 days.Premium plan offers 2.5% daily for 14 days.Property plan offers 3.5% daily for 21 days.

How can I make deposit?

Register on the site and log in to your account. In the 'Make Deposit' on Dashboard, select the plan, the payment system, and transfer the necessary amount to the designated account.

Can I reinvest my balance?

Yes, you can reinvest your capital and profits again to earn more.

Withdrawal Questions

How do I withdraw funds from the balance?

To make a 'Withdrawal', first make sure you have set your correct wallet address of your account in your dashboard. Then click withdrawal from your dashboard, choose a payment system, and enter the desired amount that is allowed for withdrawal of funds.

How long does it take for withdrawal request to get processed?

All withdrawal requests are processed instantly. Some cases will be handled manually to ensure safety takes up to 6 hours.

Are there any amount limitations on withdrawal?

The minimum withdrawal amount is 1.5 USD for all payments systems, there is not maximum limit. You can request no more than three withdrawals per day.

Do you charge any hidden fees during withdrawal?

No, we don't charge any hidden fees.

Can I withdraw fund using a different payment system?

No, you can only request a withdrawal to a payment system that you have previously deposited from.

How long does it take to process withdrawal request?

Such operations as money withdrawal are processed immediately usually under 24hrs, however, they require additional confirmations (up to 3 block confirmations) in the blockchain if you use Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Dash or Dogecoin. In case of normal mempool load (short for memorypool) it takes a few minutes at most.

Referral Questions

What opportunities of additional earnings does the company offer?

Apart from direct investment, every registered user automatically becomes our partner. Our Company offers a two-partnership program. Standard referral: 10%.Representative referral: 13%.The detailed conditions of referral cooperation can be found at 'For Partners' page.

Where can I find a referral link?

The referral link can be found in your personal account in 'Referral System' section, there you will find tools to promote.

Are there any amount limitations on withdrawal?

The minimum withdrawal amount is 1.5 USD for all payments systems, there is not maximum limit. You can request no more than three withdrawals per day.

Do you charge any hidden fees during withdrawal?

No, we don't charge any hidden fees.

How does the referral program work?

Anyone registered user can bring new partners. We actually encourage our affiliates to be active as it maximizes their income. However, the way you promote Real Estate Finance Country cannot violate the governing law. Please note, it also cannot affect the company's image negatively. Having registered under your referral link and created a deposit, such new members bring you extra profit.

Who can officially become a representative and how?

A status of the Company representative presupposes your direct involvement in Company's activities. If you really want to become an official representative of us, please complete the representative form and Send A Representative to our company's partner department. Your request will be reviewed in 24 hours. Becoming a regional representative is a huge plus, you can earn 17% of your deposit and without any required conditions.

What extra advantage does the company representative gets?

Become an Official Company representation, you will have an increased amount of affiliate commissions for the investors you refer to the platform. Representatives’ commission rate is: 13% commission.

How long does it take to process withdrawal request?

Such operations as money withdrawal are processed immediately usually under 24hrs, however, they require additional confirmations (up to 3 block confirmations) in the blockchain if you use Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Dash or Dogecoin. In case of normal mempool load (short for memorypool) it takes a few minutes at most.

Have more questions?

If you have thought of more questions to ask while getting familiarized with the website, please, 'Contact Us' though the feedback form.

Estate Marketing, established in 2014, is a company that specializes in real estate investment. Real estate investment is an important aspect of building and securing financial stability for individuals and businesses.
